Wisdom: زَوَالُ النِّعَمِ بِمَنْعِ حُقُوقِ اللَّهِ مِنْهَا وَالتَّقْصِيرِ فِي شُكْرِهَا
enWisdom: The cessation of blessings is [caused] by withholding the rights of Allah from them and falling short in showing gratitude for them
Sometimes you may be the cause of your own misfortune
How many a person is blessed through tribulation!

Wisdom: لَنْ يَلْقَى جَزَاءَ الشَّرِّ إِلَّا عَامِلُهُ
enWisdom: None shall be punished for an evil act except its doer
One who deals offensively [with others] is dealt with in the same way

Wisdom: مَنْ أَضْمَرَ الشَّرَّ لِغَيْرِهِ فَقَدْ بَدَأَ بِهِ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: One who harbor’s evil feelings [and ill will] for others has actually harmed himself

Wisdom: مَا زَالَتْ عَنْكُمْ نِعْمَةٌ وَلَا غَضَارَةُ عَيْشٍ إِلَّا بِذُنُوبٍ اجْتَرَحْتُمُوهَا وَمَا اللَّهُ بِظَلَّامٍ لِلْعَبِيدِ
enWisdom: None of the acts of disobedience to Allah, the Glorified, come about except in [the garb of] desire
Openly [and boldly] sinning in front of Allah [without any shame] hastens [divine] retributions

Wisdom: مُجَاهَرَةُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ بِالْمَعَاصِي تُعَجِّلُ النِّقَمَ
enWisdom: We seek refuge with Allah from the evils of the intellect [or from evil actions] and the ugliness of errors, and from Him do we seek assistance [against all this]

Wisdom: مُدْمِنُ الشَّهَوَاتِ صَرِيعُ الْآفَاتِ مُقَارِنُ السَّيِّئَاتِ مُوقِنٌ بِالثَّبَاتِ [بِالتَّبِعَاتِ‏]
enWisdom: One who makes a habit of following [his] lustful desires is overwhelmed by afflictions, is associated with evils and has certainty about the permanence [of this world]
